Posts.Content: Dec 23, 2010 12:11PM HR2009 wrote: Yea....it's not that bad.  Just the little pinch when they numb you up. I got myself all worked up prior to the procedure and in the end it wasn't that bad.  I just tried to relax....closed my eyes and thought about being on the beach with the warm sun :)  Best to you and Happy Holidays!
Posts.Title: Second stereotactic showed the same worriedwoman worriedwoman
